description: Dispatched when a body part fractures due to damage exceeding the fracture threshold. Fires after the fractured component is added.

entityId.description: Entity ID of the character affected by fracture

partId.description: Entity ID of the fractured body part

damageTypeId.description: Type of damage that caused the fracture (e.g., 'bludgeoning', 'crushing')

stunApplied.description: Whether stun was also applied as a secondary effect
